hits.title: # AGENTS.md instructions for /data/projects/jeffreys-skills.md
hits.snippet:
**Defining **API** **endpoint****

I’m thinking we can suggest either `POST /**api**/v1/compliance/reports/leak` or just `POST /**api**/v1/reports/leak` for our new **endpoint**
hits.content:
**Defining API endpoint**

I’m thinking we can suggest either `POST /api/v1/compliance/reports/leak` or just `POST /api/v1/reports/leak` for our new endpoint. This will be part of our design decisions. However, the plan doesn’t currently specify this endpoint, even though it includes a CLI command for reporting leaks. It seems clear there should be a corresponding API for that. So, I’ll define it as an internal endpoint and get started on creating it.

hits.title: First read ALL of the AGENTS.md file and README.md file super carefully and understand ALL of both!
hits.snippet: The `/**api**/track` **endpoint** intentionally returns 204 No Content with no body - it's a fire-and-forget tracking **endpoint**. This is by **design** and doesn't need the
hits.content:
The `/api/track` endpoint intentionally returns 204 No Content with no body - it's a fire-and-forget tracking endpoint. This is by design and doesn't need the unified envelope.

Let me close the bead and commit the changes:
